title: Sister O'dell, Dr. Jackie Walters Interview, Jussie Smollett and more.
itunes:title: Sister O'dell, Dr. Jackie Walters Interview, Jussie Smollett and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve is about that life and we are back with another episode of this here show. Sister O'dell is back for the last week of Black History Month. Jussie Smollett is back in court facing new charges. The 10th presidential candidate democratic debate went down in Charleston, SC. Deontay Wilder is saying his entrance costume had something to do with his loss. Dr. Jackie from Bravo's hit show "Married to Medicine" stops by the show to discuss her new book Queen V. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about the load not breaking you down, however, the way you carry it, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
